title: ITC Veljovic: thoughts?
content:
I am playing around with using this type for a corporate identity project I am working on. I like the look of the bold caps, although most of the type seems a bit quirky... although I like it.

Just curious about some of your thought on the face, and how the entire set works as far as readability / variations go.

vague: but pretty much how do you like it!?
author: bamaurer
